nodes.text: Finn Varatha was a female Human bounty hunter who renowned for her expertise at disguise, able to appear as friends and loved ones of her targets.
She was an associate of Cryle Cavv, and assisted Cavv and Quillin Arkell in their efforts to rescue Rivoche Tarkin from Imperial Security Bureau Central Commander Sollaine.
Following the rescue, Cavv got General Airen Cracken to assign Arkell and Varatha to his newly reinstated Special Ops group.
